ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Class envy
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe they just don t like us?  I would guess it should have been Bd and not Mk, what monk ever uses a shield?  Sounds like another of the incredibly common
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe they just don't like us? I would guess it should have been Bd and not
Mk, what monk ever uses a shield? Sounds like another of the incredibly
common typographical error. You can bet class is just a number they assign,
which means that its really easy to input the wrong class number since it
doesn't jump out at you like a meaningful entry would.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 1:25 PM
To: EQ Bards
Subject: [eqbards] Class envy


Is there some logical reason why we don get to equip this item?

Shield of Rainbow Hues: AC 18. +20 to all resistances. Classes: Mk, P,
Ra, Ro, SK, Wr. Found in the plane of fear.

Or should we petition to get included?

Sylly SongSynger
